Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Great staff, great food and fast service. Came to check on us multiple times throughout our diner. Had a small chat. The food was great for the price. And I loveeeed the red wines. Thank you!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text:
Great food. Terrible service.

We had to ask for the wine and food menu after being sat down for about 15min. …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Various delicious dishes from different kitchens around the Mediterranean, all fresh, served in a very hospitable atmosphere! Attractive price level!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Very good restaurant. Great food and staff. Loved the background music. I’ll come again!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: New location but still great tapas and wine. Even allowed special order of baked feta in honey.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: An absolute gem! Great food and ambience. Staff were also very attentive.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Super service and delicious food. I had a reservation for 2 people but one more friend decided to join last minute. The manager of the place rearranged to table to accommodate this even though the place was completely full.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: The food is delicious! Even the waitress is very nice! Food is very good . Although the guests is too much so the kitchen has some trouble then our food is very slow. But everything is good !

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Besides a bit of wait in the beginning for the servers to bring us a menu. Staff's generally really polite and friendly. Food was excellent, the neighborhood is also nice and quiet and it makes it extra enjoyable together with a glass of …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Great food, friendly staff, nice musics in background. I will definitely come back again!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Everything is very good. The waitress is very kind. Although the serving is a little bit late cause of there is a mess in the kitchen, the waitress always explain the process and condition of our serving process. Moreover, when we order our dishes, she recommend some dishes we taste very awesome.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Incredible food with very lovely staff! Wide variety of options from Spain, Greece, Italy and Turkey. They serve plomari ouzo which is also very good. Had the grilled octopus, fried calamari, fried aubergine, beef stew, patatas bravas and pimientos de pedron. Every bit was delicious. Will definitely visit again!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Excellent and attentive service. The food was delicious and authentic and staff created an all- round great experience.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: A gem of a restaurant. The staff is super pleasant and the tapas a delicious and casual way to wind down after a day of exploring or a day of meetings.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Nice Greek/mediterranean restaurant; friendly service; good food.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Great tapas place in the area - food can take a while to come sometimes though, so be prepared.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: We had such a nice dinner here. Everything was exceptional including our waitress and the food. I have a gluten and soy allergy and they were so accommodating, and even sent me an email to let me know they had gluten free bread beforehand. …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Nice food, nice experience, liked octopus and gigantes!!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Great food! Peaceful ambience... Burger n sandwiches are great. Good service!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Lovely staff and super tasty food!! Kokkinisto was by far the best!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Beautiful place, great food, nice staff, only a bit to much people inside.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: This restaurant is cozy, delicious food and nice music. Although I have to say the food was better when I tried many times at old location. On the 21st of August, first time I went to their new location at Overtoom. The food (the stew) was …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Delicious food, Very good Service and Nice Stuff. I m little bit in love

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Tasty food, friendly staff, good location and vibe. My only comment is that the tapas took a long time to arrive. Perhaps provide bread or olives in the meantime?

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Don't look any further. Great if not exceptional food at affordable rates with excellent and genuinely friendly service.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Finally, we were able to visit yesterday and it was splendid! Fine dining at its best! Beyond amazing and impeccable service. Strongly recommended!!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: O M G. I was craving pasta and sangria. It’s amaaazing here. Must order lamp chops!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: The staff is superfriendly, unfortunately half the dishes we ordered were cold on arrival. The staff made sure they were replaced. The dishes were very tasteful though! …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Love this place. Been here several times with friends, food and service are always great. It's extremely hard to find such a good combination in Amsterdam. Would highly recommend to anyone interested in Mediterranean tapas and great service!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Delicious dinner with friends with amazing service. The staffs were extremely friendly and kind. Food was great, came very quickly and reasonably priced. Definitely will recommend!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Pretty mediocre place, food quality was very medium with grilled frozen food; both seafood dishes seemed they were taken out of the freezer upon order. The grill left a burned/bitter aftertaste to the food. The room temperature was also a …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Decent enough food (in rather small portions) let down by sloppy inattentive service. To be fair, the head waiter was good, fun and charming. But he was totally let down by the amateurs around him. It took half an hour for someone to …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Great food and warm and friendly service. A great family business and we will 100% go back. A strong recommend.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Fabulous restaurant! Lovely atmosphere and interior, really cosy feeling to the place. Absolutely tremendous food, so many lovely dishes and different flavours. Great spot for sharing a meal and trying lots of different things. Staff were …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: A true gem in Amsterdam! Delicious food, great selection of wines and the most welcoming staff you can have! This was more than just a dinner at a restaurant - it was a wonderful experience and memory! Thank you!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: As always, outstanding service with a friendly smile. Reduced menu but still serving delicious, generous dishes. Our favourite restaurant in Amsterdam :)

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Thanks food is terrific. High quality ingredients, cooked well. The service was bordering on unbearably bad. I almost have one star just because the service was so terrible, but wanted to be fair to the quality of the food. The waitress …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Stumbled on this wonderful restaurant our first night in Amsterdam and ended up going again during our visit. Among their dishes they offer a large selection of Mediterranean tapas beautifully prepared and delicious. Highly recommend searching out this gem.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Had an amazing meal here with 2 friends when visiting Amsterdam in February. Food was absolutely delicious we ordered so much as there was lots we liked the look of. Sangria was also lovely you could tell it was made using good ingredients. Staff and hospitality also great!!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: I had some nice Gambas and a glass of white wine waiting for takeaway, the server was so helpful in not only filling my order but making me laugh and smile too! The tuna is to die for, takeaway still tastes sushi fresh tuna level standards! Thank you!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text:
My family and I had a terrible experience dining at oresti’s taverna.

The service was extremely slow and disorganized, with multiple waitresses being …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: One of the best places to eat great Greek and mediterian food in Amsterdam in my opinion. Best service, reasonable price and variety of good cheese and meat. Order different tapas to share, you will not regret!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text:
Nice place. Good tapas. Friendly and good service.
A good stop for a drink and a bite.
Always a little confusing, the dutch tapas concept. …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Great place to refresh and regain energies with great dutch traditionals, spanish tapas and greek especialities. Good service.Top :)

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Well-tasting food with a trade-off that unfortunately makes the experience a drag and unpleasant. …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: We had a selection of mediterranean tapas/meze to share, and both selection and quality was excellent. …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: We enjoyed six selections from the tapas menu plus a desert and wine and every mouthful was delicious.  The restaurant is comfortable and the staff could not have been more friendly and helpful. Just a lovely little spot in a busy city.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Would not recommend for a group. Booked it more than a month in advance for 15 people. We arrived at 18:30 and got our dessert passed 22:00... Service was extremely slow despite the fact we went for a set menu. I had to complain at some …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Really nice Greek restaurant. The only thing I wish they'd improve is the size of the portions of the food. They could expand it more. I say this because there is another Greek restaurant called Alexandros in Amstelveen which has hearty, big portions and about the same prices as Oresti's

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: This is the worst food I ever ordered. One of these small, not crispy, with 2 little pieces of meat and some fries is 7,50! I can’t believe how crappy it is. The Greek salad is a salad you order on the side as an Appetizer. At this place an …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: I visited Orestis with my boyfriend because of the positive reviews. The atmosphere is ok. Food took too long to arrive, the waitress brought us different things from what we ordered and we could have better spent our money eating from the supermarket. Not satisfied!!!! The wine was good.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Great place. I found the food to be great, if a liitle greasy but still very nice. I wouldn't mark them down on it! Excellent staff too who make you feel at home if just having a beer at the bar. Gezellig!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: One of my favorite places to bring friends when they come to visit Amsterdam. The food is always good and the wine is reasonably priced. Sometimes the wait can be a little long to order drinks/food, but this hasn't ever detracted from the overall experience.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Perfect taste, nice ambience, very friendly staff! The valentine special 'pita pizza' is a pleasant surprise. We enjoyed it a lot

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: We had an excellent experience with a group of two families at Oresti's.  The service was attentive and friendly.  The food was very tasty -- some great tapas choices.  And the price was reasonable.  Definitely a place to repeat.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: This was a good experience. They recommended a fixed menu for a group of our size, and there were a good selection of tapas. This was a good suggestion and I recommend it for any groups, unless you are predominantly vegetarian, as the …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: The items on the menu aren't very innovative but the execution is impeccable. We tried the pata negra, the calamares, the fried aubergine, the pimientos de padrón, the chicken in orange, the patatas bravas. All of them perfectly prepared and tasty. Service and decor also outstanding!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Super cute place where the owners know their neighbours and the service is friendly and helpful. If they weather is nice there is space to sit outside. The food was good; not fine dining, but very pleasant. We were satisfied with the bill at the end of the night.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: One of my favorite places in Amsterdam. The service is always extraordinarily good, and the food is excellent. It's a bit pricey, but you get what you pay for.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: One of if not my absolute favorite tapas places in Amsterdam.  Go only if you're looking for the full tapas experience: i.e. you'll be there for hours.  It's a great atmosphere to bring a large group or even just a few people if you're in …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Seated at 7:30. Food arrived at 9. I was very disappointed with the new location as I had been several times to De Pijp location with a nice experience. Still two stars because the food was quite good. But service seemed to be having an off night.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: The food was ok. Small portions leave you wanting more, though, especially for the price. The seats we got were awfully uncomfortable. The service was very slow and inconsistent. Took 30 minutes to bring bread.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: I think this was the worst canned food I ate in my life. I do no think the chef went through the effort of changing the canned food in any way. Only after I asked the waitress did she clean our table and I had my meal holding one of my …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: The staff is friendly and the food is tasty. Try the sangria as well, it goes with the tapas style menu. Highly recommend a visit. Make sure they have an available table since they do get busy!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Easily the best tapas I have had in Amsterdam. A real suprise. We had the chef's choice...I'm coming back soon! Super friendly staff who made us feel very special.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Eaten here three times this week - once solo and twice with colleagues. An excellent experience each time - friendly staff and great food. The Halloumi in particular is well worth trying.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text:
Good food, cosy terrace, friendly staff, but sometimes pricey.

A few of the dish sizes surprised us, eg when we ordered the souvlaki we didn't …

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Had such a lovely dinner experience last night.  The new location is beautiful, the ambience and food were incredible- and the service was outstanding.  Thank you for a great evening!

Review Text: Lovely tapas place. Food was gorgeous and we didn't wait for long. Went on a Friday evening without booking for 2 ppl. Would suggest booking for bigger tables.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: came here twice during our week in amsterdam - great place! diverse selection of food and wines, cozy atmosphere, and super friendly staff. highly recommend checking this place out.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Friendly staff but the food wasn't great. I recommend sticking to the tapas and having a good time rather than expecting amazing food (don't get me wrong, the food is good, but not stellar).

Review Text: Very good concept, great food every time.

Name: Oresti's Taverna

Name: Oresti's Taverna

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Get cosy little place, fantastic food ( not just pull straight out of the freezer 😉) and amazing wine list! A must for Amsterdam's quirky diner's.

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Cozy place. Attentive staff that are easy to get hold of and regularly checks in. The food came very fast, and was tasty. And the manchego with honey was really nice!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
Review Text: Second time we came here with my friends, we just LOVE the calamari and the head waitress! Will be back!

Name: Oresti's Taverna
